answers.answer: I hear that hot tubs can be dangerous, however, at this moment I am lightheaded and it is anxiety, I hope.

I would check with your doctors on this.  Diabetes and blood pressure can both cause one to be light headed.  If you are light headed after being in the hot tub, then I would think it's impacting you in a bad way.  But your sugar and BP could also be dropping too low, I guess what I'm saying is it depends on "when" you are lightheaded.
I agree with mammo, its best to seek your doctors advice

question: i am a diebetic & have high bloodpreasure they are both fine but latiley for the last 3 days i am lightheated we just got a hot tub 7 i was wonderding if going in that 2 or 3 times a day could be a problem
title: i am a dibetic & have high bloodpreasure but latily i have been lighheated my bloodsugar & bloodpreasure are fine
